code_events.event:
Called when a field is being formatted for display in the framework.

Callback signature:

\AL\FilterFramework\ContentTypeProviderInterface $contentTypeProvider, \XF\CustomField\Definition $field, $value, &$formattedValue

Arguments:

  1. \AL\FilterFramework\ContentTypeProviderInterface $contentTypeProvider - An object representing the content type provider from an add-on.
  2. \XF\CustomField\Definition $field - Field definition.
  3. $value - The original value of the field.
  4. &$formattedValue - A reference to the value that will be displayed. Set to any non-null value to skip default processing.
